item.title: Encountering the Jesus who Heals (Mark's Story of Jesus)
item.dc:creator: David Kludt
item.description:
This week's teaching was an invitation into an experiential encounter with three texts that tell stories of healing.

The audio is the introduction into the experience; read more about the stations on our blog HERE.

item.title: Play: God's Big Story
item.dc:creator: David Kludt
item.description: On September 13, we Gathered together as a full family - kids including - to multi-generationally, creatively and collaboratively, engage God's Big Story as the story we each are invited into.
item.itunes:author: Caitlyn Littrell

item.title: Play: The World Where Kids Lead the Way
item.dc:creator: David Kludt
item.description:
Isaiah 11 speaks of a world where unlikely pairings - lions and lambs, toddlers and vipers - will peaceably share space together without any fear of violence or hurt.

In this world, the prophet says, kids will lead the way.
item.itunes:author: Dave Kludt
